title: Bernadette Peters 1979 1998
description:
Bernadette Peters 1979 1998

1979 Edmonton Laserdisc Rip
(This is from an early Discovision LD that did not have a
 protective coating on the recording surface; bits of that
 surface flaked off. Audio & video are noisy.)
Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 720x494 (4:3) 29.924fps 2000Kbps
Audio: FLAC (framed) 48000Hz stereo 1536kbps

1979 Edmonton DVD Rip

Subtitle: UTF-8 English Portuguese Spanish French German Japanese
(Note: Song lyrics are not subtitled)
Menu: Same as the LD except that the first track has been dropped.
